mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.openid AS "openid", a.headimg AS "headimg", a.nickname AS "nickname", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.coin AS "coin", a.sex AS "sex", a.version_no AS "versionNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memp_user( id, openid, headimg, nickname, mobile, coin, sex, version_no, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openid}, #{headimg}, #{nickname}, #{mobile}, #{coin}, #{sex}, #{versionNo}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE memp_user SET openid = #{openid}, headimg = #{headimg}, nickname = #{nickname}, mobile = #{mobile}, coin = #{coin}, sex = #{sex}, version_no = #{versionNo}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
